remarks: Class builder membership after substituting an expression ` A ` (containing ` y ` ) for ` x ` in the class expression ` ch ` . (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2012.)
statement:
rabxfrd.1 $e |- F/_ y B $.
rabxfrd.2 $e |- F/_ y C $.
rabxfrd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. D ) -> A e. D ) $.
rabxfrd.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rabxfrd.5 $e |- ( y = B -> A = C ) $.
rabxfrd $p |- ( ( ph /\ B e. D ) -> ( C e. { x e. D | ps } <-> B e. { y e. D | ch } ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps y $.
